title: S3 Ep16: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 9 – The Moonshine State
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 9 – The Moonshine State
description:
September 6, 2018 / Susan, Colin, and Rabia are joined by special guest Gary Mitchum Reeves to discuss Episode 9 of the Dennis Perry case, and Mitchum’s new podcast.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Bombas and VistaPrint.
